author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
During recent modifications for SIM (triggered by DD4Hep migration) Geant4 sequential run using OscarProducer was slightly broken. This PR restore this functionality. Note, that this mode does not used, instead we are using OscarMTProducer everywhere.

Additionally, few basic parameters of these producers moved from untracked to normal.
No change in regression is expected.
